definitions: Cut (a solid material) in order to produce an object, design, or inscription.
Cut cooked meat into slices for eating.
Form or shape (something) with great care or skill.
Create or establish something in a significant or lasting way.
examples: He carved a statue from wood.
She carved the turkey for dinner.
The artist carved intricate details into the stone.
They carved out a niche for themselves in the market.
